title: Grand Portage National Monument: Convenience Store
body: Convenience Store        Grand Portage Trading Post NPS Photo / Sharon Walker   Â    A convenience store with a Rendezvous Grill, groceries, fishing and sporting supplies, hardware and auto supplies and a gift shop is located in the Grand Portage Trading Post.   Trading Post Hours Seven days a week - 6:00 a.m. - 11:00 p.m. For further information: Call 1-218-475-2282
